spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall layout is highly accurate. Doorways are mostly represented as open gaps rather than swinging door assets. Window placement in the living area matches the blueprint correctly.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent room adjacency. However, the exterior 'closet'/balcony area lacks the specified door swing. Interior bathroom partitions are slightly thicker than the original architectural intent.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1, including the specific rug orientation in the living room and the kitchen island configuration.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric projection with consistent soft lighting and clean matte materials. Geometry is crisp with no visible rendering artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Missing door leaf assets; all doors are rendered as open structural thresholds.
The balcony/closet area at the top left lacks the defined entrance door seen in the 2D plan.
Slight proportion distortion in the hallway width between the bedrooms compared to the dimensioned plan.
